# Description

As a postdoctoral researcher for the CORNER project, I am deeply committed to actively involving children in the research process. Through innovative methods such as co-creation and photovoice, I strive to amplify children's voices and enhance their participation. By sharing my insights and experiences, I aim to contribute to the ongoing effort to empower citizens — especially children — to engage meaningfully in research, ensuring their perspectives shape the outcomes that affect their lives.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Julia Steenwegen"
special_skill <- c("cooking", "children participation")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", "data management", "data sharing", "reproducible analysis", all_of(special_skill), "open access", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
